Appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
Appetizers.description: Breaded and fried mozzarella served with marinara sauce

Appetizers.name: Loaded Nachos
Appetizers.description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, black beans, jalapenos, and sour cream

Appetizers.name: Fried Pickles
Appetizers.description: Breaded and fried pickle slices served with ranch dressing

Burgers.name: Classic Burger
Burgers.description: Beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of condiments, served on a bun

Burgers.name: Cheeseburger
Burgers.description: Beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of condiments, served on a bun

Burgers.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
Burgers.description: Beef patty with bacon, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of condiments, served on a bun

Sides.name: Onion Rings
Sides.description: Thinly sliced and breaded onion rings, fried until golden brown

Sides.name: Cole Slaw
Sides.description: Shredded cabbage and carrots with a mayonnaise dressing

Desserts.name: Ice Cream Sundae
Desserts.description: Vanilla ice cream with your choice of toppings and whipped cream
